author: Joseph Beasley
text: Is anyone familiar with any case studies or any other research related to restructuring park maintenance into a buildings & grounds department/division? Currently considering which services should go under a buildings & grounds department/division.
title: Park Maintenance to Buildings and Grounds Dept
